channel.title: Html on Coding notes - and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Html on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Minimal HTML5 Template
item.description: A minimal HTML5 template with all essential elements: <!doctype html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>The HTML5 Herald</title> <meta name="description" content="The HTML5 Herald"> <meta name="author" content="SitePoint"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/styles.css?v=1.0"> </head> <body> <div> <p>Hey Bustro</p> </div> <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1/jquery.min.js"></script> <script src="js/scripts.js"></script> <script> alert("Hey Bustro"); </script> </body> </html>
